metadata.description:
The Realm Knights have been called on for a deadly mission. HiboCorp has located the Dark Queen and Red, Helsing, Neptune, Cross, and Sela are sent in to take her out for good. However, as they head into the fight of their lives, they remain unaware that one of their own has already betrayed them. Do not miss this game-changing issue of Realm Knights. 
*Age of Darkness Tie-in
metadata.name: Age of Darkness: Realm Knights
